With a legacy spanning over three decades since our establishment in 1994, we've emerged as a leading manufacturer in the pet industry. Our journey commenced with a fervent dedication to crafting premium pet bedding, a commitment that has since propelled us to expand our offerings extensively.

Our pet beds are made to order in the USA, ensuring each one meets our high standards of quality and craftsmanship. Using a blend of local and imported materials, we create durable, comfortable, and stylish beds that your furry friends will love.
